sentence.Network_en: The two new Death Eaters Impedimenta Harry, Hermione, and Neville.
sentence.Network_cn: 二个新的食死徒向哈利, 赫敏和纳威射出了障碍咒.

sentence.Network_en: He came with his wife, six children, four dogs and various other impedimenta.
sentence.Network_cn: 他来时携妻子 、 六个孩子 、 四条狗以及各式各样的累赘什物.

sentence.Network_en: And the Impediment Jinx , spell word Impedimenta, can block someone or something from moving caster.
sentence.Network_cn: 障碍咒的咒语是“障碍重重”, 它能阻止人和东西向施咒这移动.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 哈利波特人物表_百度知道 ... 昏昏倒地 stupefy 障碍重重 impedimenta 速速禁锢 incarcerous.
哈利波特的魔法咒语_百度知道 ... 7.魂魄出窍夺魂咒 Imperio 8.障碍重重障碍咒 Impedimenta 9.昏昏倒地 Stupefy.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... magenta 紫红色（的染料） impedimenta 随身携带物，行李 iota 极小量，极少.
impediment 妨碍impedimenta 妨碍行进impedimental 妨碍的

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from Latin, plural of impedimentum 'impediment', from impedire (see impede)

means.word_mean: 1. any structure that makes progress difficult
2. the baggage and equipment carried by an army

auth_sentence.content: Having stowed away certain impedimenta..., he took his travelling-bag in his hand.

auth_sentence.content: There was no sign of piano, organ, hymn-books, church programmessthe familiar ecclesiastical impedimenta.
